Detailed Description

Main window class.

Tonatiuh's main window class. It includes the menu bars and all the actions, signals and slots to provide user interaction with the program.

Member Function Documentation

void MainWindow::ComputeSceneTreeMap ( InstanceNode *  instanceNode,
Transform  parentWTO 
) [private]

Compute a map with the InstanceNodes of sub-tree with top node instanceNode.

The map stores for each InstanceNode its BBox and its transform in global coordinates.

bool MainWindow::Delete (  )  [private]

Creates a new delete command, where the selected node was deleted. child.

Returns true if the node was successfully deleted, otherwise returns false.

bool MainWindow::OkToContinue (  )  [private]

Returns true if the application is ready to start with other model. Otherwise, returns false.

void MainWindow::on_actionDisplay_rays_toggled (  )  [slot]

If actionDisplay_rays is checked the 3D view shows rays representation. Otherwise the representation is hidden.

void MainWindow::on_actionExport_PhotonMap_triggered (  )  [slot]

Writes the photons stored at the photon map at user defined file. Creates a dialog to define the export paramenters.

void MainWindow::on_actionGrid_toggled (  )  [slot]

Action slot to show/hide a grid with the scene dimensions.

void MainWindow::on_actionGridSettings_triggered (  )  [slot]

Action slot to open grid settings dialog.

void MainWindow::on_actionRayTraceOptions_triggered (  )  [slot]

Action slot to open a Ray Trace Options dialog.

SoBaseKit *  coinNode,
QString  coinPart 
) [slot]

Creates a command for the modification of a node parameter.

The command is stored at the stack.

bool MainWindow::Paste ( tgc::PasteType  type  )  [private]

Creates a new type paste command. The clipboard node was inerted as selected node child.

Returns true if the node was successfully pasted, otherwise returns false.

void MainWindow::ReadSettings (  )  [private]

Restores application settings.

InstanceNode *&  lightInstance,
SoTransform *&  lightTransform,
TSunShape *&  sunShape,
TShape *&  raycastingShape 
) [slot]

Checks whether a ray tracing can be started with the current light and model.

bool MainWindow::Save (  )  [private]

Returns true if the tonatiuh model is correctly saved in the current file. Otherwise, returns false.

If a current file is not defined, it calls to SaveAs funtios.

See also:
SaveAs, SaveFile.

bool MainWindow::SaveAs (  )  [private]

Returns true if the tonatiuh model is correctly saved. Otherwise, returns false. A file dialog is created to select a file.

See also:
Save, SaveFile.

bool MainWindow::SaveFile ( const QString &  fileName  )  [private]

Returns true if the tonatiuh model is correctly saved into the the given fileName. Otherwise, returns false.

See also:
Save, SaveAs.

void MainWindow::SetEnabled_SunPositionCalculator ( int  enabled  )  [slot]

This property holds whether the SunPositionCalculator action is enabled. If the action is disabled, it does not disappear from menu, but it is displayed in a way which indicates that they are unavailable.

void MainWindow::SetupActionInsertShape ( TShapeFactory *  pTShapeFactory  )  [private]

Creates an action for the /a pTShapeFactory and adds to shape insert menu and toolbar.

void MainWindow::SetupMenus (  )  [private]

Creates a menu for last used files

void MainWindow::ShowRaysIn3DView (  )  [slot]

Shows the rays and photons stored at the photon map in the 3D view.

void MainWindow::StartManipulation ( SoDragger *  dragger  ) 

Compute a map with the InstanceNodes of sub-tree with top node instanceNode.

The map stores for each InstanceNode its BBox and its transform in global coordinates.

bool MainWindow::StartOver ( const QString &  fileName  )  [private]

Returns to the start origin state and starts with a new model defined in fileName. If the file name is not defined, it starts with an empty scene.

void MainWindow::WriteSettings (  )  [private]

Saves application settings.
